mapper.update: update t_goods_pro_val set skuId = #{skuId},proId = #{proId},value = #{value} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from (select pro_val.skuId,group_concat(pro_val.value) as uvalue,group_concat(pro_val.id) as ids from t_goods_pro_val as pro_val group by pro_val.skuId) as t where t.skuId = #{skuId}

select * from (select pro.*, pro_val.skuid, group_concat(pro_val.value) as value from t_goods_pro as pro left join t_goods_pro_val as pro_val on pro.id = pro_val.proid group by pro_val.proid) as t where t.typeid = #{typeId}
